intro: The year 2014 saw Operation Protective Edge, another devastating Israeli military offensive in the Gaza Strip. This operation caused widespread destruction and a high number of civilian casualties, further deepening the humanitarian crisis in the besieged territory.

events.title: Operation Protective Edge Begins
events.text: Israel launched a 51-day military operation in the Gaza Strip. The offensive resulted in the deaths of over 2,200 Palestinians, including a large number of women and children, and the destruction of tens of thousands of homes.

events.title: Ceasefire Agreement
events.text: A long-term ceasefire agreement was reached between Israel and Palestinian factions in Gaza, mediated by Egypt, ending Operation Protective Edge.

sources.title: Gaza ceasefire: Israel and Palestinians agree to end 50-day conflict
